name: py-d2to1
description:
d2to1 (the 'd' is for 'distutils') allows using distutils2-like
setup.cfg files for a package's metadata with a distribute/setuptools
setup.py script.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-stsci-distutils
dependent_to.description:
This package contains utilities used to package some of STScI's Python
projects.

dependent_to.name: py-pywcs
dependent_to.description:
pywcs is a set of routines for handling the FITS World Coordinate System
(WCS) standard.
